comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: From NYT of 11/19/1912 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F00F1FFF355E13738... "BERMUDIANS CHEER AS WILSON LANDS; President-Elect Pleases with Happy Response to Official Address of Welcome." He sailed on the Bermudian, of the Quebec Steamship Company. See www.timetableimages.com/maritime/images/qsc11.htm and www.timetableimages.com/maritime/images/qsc13i.htm for pictures of the ship.
